forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
